mapper.select: select comment.id, comment.blog_id, comment.parent_id, comment.user_id, users.user_account as userName, users.user_logo as userLogo, comment.comment, comment.create_time from bus_comment comment left join bus_user users on users.delete_flag = 0 and users.id = comment.user_id where comment.delete_flag = 0 and comment.blog_id = #{condition.blogId}
